memberdef.name: RCPPSW_MATH_RANGE_CONV2DISC
memberdef.initializer: static inline range##dest_prefix drange2##dest_prefix##range( \ const range##dest_prefix& other, double scale) { \ return range##dest_prefix(static_cast<dest_type>(other.lb() / scale), \ static_cast<dest_type>(other.ub() / scale)); \ }

briefdescription.para: Convert ranged -> range{i,u,z}, applying a divisive scaling factor.

memberdef.name: RCPPSW_MATH_RANGE_DIRECT_CONV2FLT

briefdescription.para: Convert range{i,u,z} -> ranged directly, without applying any scaling.

memberdef.name: RCPPSW_MATH_RANGE_SCALED_CONV2FLT
memberdef.initializer: static inline ranged prefix##range2drange(const range##prefix& other, \ double scale) { \ return ranged(other.lb() * scale, other.ub() * scale); \ }

briefdescription.para: Convert range{i,u,z} -> ranged, applying a multiplicative scaling factor.
